PerfectNetExp.abs: tophamper 累赘, topheavy 头重脚轻的, tophat 顶帽

entry.tran: 头重脚轻的;上重下轻的
entry.def: Something that is top-heavy is larger or heavier at the top than at the bottom, and might therefore fall over.

example.tran: 类似向日葵这样头重脚轻的花

entry.tran: 高级官员过多的;行政管理人员过多的
entry.def: If you describe a business or other organization as top-heavy, you mean that it has too many senior managers in relation to the number of junior managers or workers.

example.tran: 高级官员过多的官僚体系
